function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Nurses working long hours in isolation facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of fatigue and burnout, leading to decreased effectiveness in patient care and increased risk of errors.","Mitigation":"Implement strict scheduling and rest policies, provide psychological support, and ensure regular breaks.","Technologies":"Scheduling software, fatigue monitoring technology, remote monitoring tools.","People":"Nurses in isolation facilities, patients receiving care from these nurses.","Owner":"Hospital management, nursing directors."},{"Description":"Nursing shortage due to the COVID-19 pandemic crisis","Impact":"Increased workload on existing nursing staff, decreased quality of patient care, increased risk of staff burnout and turnover.","Mitigation":"Implement exchange programs, prioritize staffing based on vulnerability factors, provide incentives for non-isolation facility work.","Technologies":"Scheduling software, workforce management tools, communication platforms.","People":"Nursing directors, hospital management, nursing staff.","Owner":"Nursing directors, hospital management."},{"Description":"Inadequate hospital preparation for the coronavirus pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare-associated infections, inadequate patient care, lack of necessary resources for infection control.","Mitigation":"Prioritize equipping hospitals with necessary equipment and supplies, establish infection control protocols, provide training for hospital staff.","Technologies":"Infection control technology, telemedicine, remote monitoring tools.","People":"Patients, hospital staff, infection control team.","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team."}]}
